title: Krita 5.2 Brings Animation and Text Handling Improvements, Built-In FFmpeg
description:
Krita 5.2 open-source digital painting software is now available for download with animation and text handling improvements, built-in FFmpeg, tool enhancements, and many under-the-hood changes.

The post Krita 5.2 Brings Animation and Text Handling Improvements, Built-In FFmpeg appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Slax Linux Gets Enhanced Session Management and Boot Parameter Options
description:
Slax Linux 12.1 and 15.0.2 are now available for download with enhanced session management and boot parameter options, improved Xorg initialization, and bug fixes.

The post Slax Linux Gets Enhanced Session Management and Boot Parameter Options appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
